channel.title: Hello =)
channel.description:
This have not so much with coding or anything to do with. but anyway :) i tell you what i was thinkin in school yesterday.
when i had swedish lession we talked about novels. and my teacher starter to learn how to right one. in a novel u need a: *Beginning *environment (that the peaple in the novel is living in) *the characters of cource. *the plot/act/action *"turning-point. *and the end.
and than i figure out its almost like coding a server.
in a novel u need an act/plot part that is very small/short and in a server u need the client java to be as small as possible. and than as more you got of those things around the "act" as better will the story be. and as more handlers (the files around java(lol)) you got as better will the server be without lagg.
kinda cool ey? =) so to me, its almost to right a novel but in a "diffrent language" lol xD.
well, if this topic is in wrong place plz remove it :)
~Thx

item.title: Hello =)
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

[quote=“Newb 2341, post:3, topic:157502”]First, how are you learning about anything to DO with writing - your grammar is horrible.
And second, this belongs in no section, and should be burned in the fiery pits of Hell.[/quote]

dog eats dog:

Fiery pits of hell? Uh hu.

item.title: Hello =)
item.dc:creator: @GoldGate GoldGate
item.description:
@GoldGate wrote:

This have not so much with coding or anything to do with. but anyway i tell you what i was thinkin in school yesterday.

when i had swedish lession we talked about novels. and my teacher starter to learn how to right one.
in a novel u need a:
*Beginning
*environment (that the peaple in the novel is living in)
*the characters of cource.
*the plot/act/action
*"turning-point.
*and the end.

and than i figure out its almost like coding a server.

in a novel u need an act/plot part that is very small/short and in a server u need the client java to be as small as possible. and than as more you got of those things around the “act” as better will the story be. and as more handlers (the files around java(lol)) you got as better will the server be without lagg.

kinda cool ey? =) so to me, its almost to right a novel but in a “diffrent language” lol xD.

well, if this topic is in wrong place plz remove it

~Thx
